meta.description: Traveling Salesperson Problem for 4 cities with given travel costs.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Cities to be visited by the salesperson

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the salesperson travels from city i to city j

objective.name: min_total_travel_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)

constraints.name: visit_city_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_city_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_city_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 2

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 3

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 1 and city 4

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 1

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 3

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 4

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 1

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 2

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 4

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 1

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 2

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 3
